content: may be a small hole between the legs when joined when you have finished the doll simply take a small piece of yarn and with your darning needle sew the hole closed round 11 *single_crochet in each of the next 5sts 2sc in the next st repeat from * around 21sts round 12 *single_crochet in each of the next 6sts 2sc in the next st repeat from * around 24sts round 13 *single_crochet in each of the next 7sts 2sc in the next st repeat from * around 27sts rnds 14 & 15 single_crochet in each st around 27sts stuff the body firmly as you work up towards the head round 16 *single_crochet in each of the next 7sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts round 17 single_crochet in each st around 24st round 18 *single_crochet in each of the next 2sts decrease repeat from * around 18sts round 19 single_crochet in each st around 18sts round 20 *single_crochet in the next st decrease repeat from * around 12sts round 21 & 22 single_crochet in each st around 12sts do not fasten_off and continue on to the… head again continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 23 work 2sc in each st around 24sts round 24 *single_crochet in each of the next 3sts 2sc in the next st repeat from * around 30sts round 25 *single_crochet in each of the next 4sts 2sc in the next st repeat from * around 36sts rnds 26 - 33 single_crochet in each st around 36sts if using safety eyes place them between rounds 28 and 29 making sure that they are placed 5sts apart stuff firmly as you work before the opening gets too small push stuffing from the head down into the neck to ensure your doll is firmly stuffed throughout round 34 *single_crochet in each of the next 4sts decrease repeat from * around 30sts round 35 *single_crochet in each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts round 36 *single_crochet in each of the next 2sts decrease repeat from * around 18sts round 37 *single_crochet in the next st decrease repeat from * around 12sts round 38 decrease around 6sts fasten_off leaving a tail weave yarn through remaining stitches with a darning needle and pull to close the hole and hide any loose ends hands and arms make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from hand to shoulder use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st and work 8sc 8sts round 2 3hdc in the first st creates hand shaping single_crochet in each of the remaining 7sts 10sts round 3 decrease single_crochet in each of the remaining 8sts 9sts round 4 decrease single_crochet in each of the remaining 7sts 8sts rnds 5 - 7 single_crochet in each st around 8sts stuff arm
